colors.rules: Primary for main actions, secondary for CTAs. Never use literal colors without dark mode variants.

spacing.rules: Use only these values. Map to Tailwind: p-2 (8), p-4 (16), p-6 (24), p-8 (32), p-10 (40), p-12 (48), p-16 (64)

typography.rules: Follow hierarchy strictly. Use muted-foreground for secondary text.

Button.rules: Always use variant prop. Never add custom h- classes. size='icon' buttons should never have width/height classes.

Card.rules: Use consistent padding. Never nest Cards. Never stretch Card full width of sidebar.

Badge.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold
Badge.rules: Never add hover/active states. Content is always on one line.

interactions.hover: Use hover-elevate class for elevation. Never use hover:bg-* on Buttons.
interactions.active: Use active-elevate-2 class. Never manually implement active states on Buttons/Badges.
interactions.toggle: Use toggle-elevate and toggle-elevated classes for toggle states.
interactions.rules: Button and Badge components have built-in hover/active. Never override.

contrast.wcag_minimum: 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text
contrast.rules: Light text never on light background. Dark text never on dark background.

borders.radius: rounded-md for most elements. rounded-lg for Cards. rounded-full for avatars/pills.
borders.color: Use border-border. Never apply partial borders (border-l-4) to rounded elements.
borders.rules: If using rounded, either no border or full border. Never 1-3 sided borders on rounded elements.
